## Slide with R Code

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| fig-width: 8
#| fig-height: 4

# Example R code
library(ggplot2)
mtcars |>
  ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(title = "Car Weight vs. MPG",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles Per Gallon")
```
